connect20/bontact_widget_multichannel.name: connect20/Bontact_Widget_Multichannel

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/bontact_widget_multichannel.description: Engage visitors with a multi-channel communication widget that includes live chat, callback, text messages, and email. Increase their satisfaction and your conversion rates.
